name: Starving Through Space
description:
The Game

Follow the stream of consciousness of an astronaut getting lost in the deep of space, while his memories starts to appear all around him.

Collect the sparkly memories, not the white ones or the spaceman will drive himself into suicide. You have a total amout of 24 memory lines to collect.

One button: just drive the astronaut through the screen by simply clicking on it. But beware of the borders, when being outside of the gaming window the life of the spaceman will decrease fast.

Entirely made in 72h for the #minijam 67.

Soundtrack - Eternity by Stellardrone

Controls

Click on screen.

Software

  • Game Engine - Game Maker Studio 2
  • Graphic Design - Adobe Illustrator, Paint.NET
  • Sound Design - Adobe Audition, Bfxr

! WARNING !

I suggest you to download the game and play the PC version for a better experience, instead of playing on browser.

If you have a smartphone powerful enough, you can also play the game on it!

PROUDLY MADE IN ITALY BY ZENO BIANCHINI AND WOLF GAMES
